Question 6
  Found [same_fringe] with compatible type.
  Failure: [same_fringe] is incorrect.
    The following expression:
    
     | same_fringe (Node (Leaf, 0, Node (Leaf, 1, Leaf))) (
     |   Node (Node (Leaf, 0, Leaf), 1, Leaf)
     | )
    produces the following result: [false] This is invalid. Producing the
    following result is valid: [true]
